function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential resurgence of COVID-19 due to relaxation of restrictions","Impact":"Increased spread of the disease, leading to more cases and potential strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Continued monitoring of infection rates and rapid response to new outbreaks, promoting ongoing adherence to safety measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, real-time data analytics for infection rates","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government health agencies, local authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Concerns over reduced demand in the early stages of normalization","Impact":"Financial strain on businesses, potential closures and job losses","Mitigation":"Promotion of consumer confidence through transparent safety measures, financial support for struggling businesses, targeted marketing campaigns","Technologies":"Online reservation systems, contactless payment systems, social distancing monitoring tools","People":"Restaurant owners, service providers, employees, local communities","Owner":"Business owners, government support programs, marketing agencies"}]}
